subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Robbie Findley’s 12 goals for Real Salt Lake this season and injuries to his friend Charlie Davies may give him an opening to win a place on the U.S. World Cup team.
snippet: Robbie Findley’s 12 goals for Real Salt Lake this season and injuries to his friend Charlie Davies may give him an opening to win a place on the U.S. World Cup team.
